projects.name: Highlands Brain
projects.details:
Brain - Educational Staff/Student Dashboard

Brain is a modern, responsive, and scalable educational dashboard designed to facilitate seamless collaboration and management for both Staff and Students. The platform integrates a wide range of functional modules including Events, Announcements, Classes, Feed, Compliance, Chat, Resources, Support, Reports, Services, and Profile Management.

Built with Next.js and React, Brain is optimized for performance, modularity, and a clean development experience.

🚀 Features

  • 🔔 Announcements – Share and manage announcements in real-time.
  • 📅 Events – Event scheduling and calendar integration.
  • 📚 Classes – Manage student and teacher interactions within virtual classrooms.
  • 📥 Feed – Centralized Announcement/Events/Services and updates stream.
  • ✅ Compliance – Track student/staff compliance status.
  • 💬 Chat – Real-time messaging and channel-based communication (Stream Chat).
  • 📂 Resources – Access to learning materials, documents, and references.
  • 🛠️ Support – Raise and manage support queries.
  • 📊 Reports – Generate performance and activity reports.
  • ⚙️ Services – Request and track institutional services.
  • 👤 Profiles – Manage user settings and roles.

🧠 Architecture & Best Practices

✅ React Optimization

  • Code-Splitting & Lazy Loading: Leveraged via next/dynamic for heavy components.
  • Memoization: useMemo, useCallback, and React.memo() for avoiding unnecessary re-renders.
  • Debounced Inputs: Especially in search/chat modules for optimized performance.
  • SSR/SSG: Server-Side Rendering and Static Site Generation where applicable for better SEO and performance.

🎨 Theming

  • Uses global CSS variables for primary/secondary colors.
  • Switchable light and dark mode using a theme context.
  • Component-level scoped styling for maintainability.

🧹 Linting & Formatting

  • ESLint with Airbnb config for consistent code quality.
  • Prettier for code formatting with auto-fix on save.
  • git-cz pre-commit hooks to enforce linting and formatting before commits.

🔖 Versioning

  • Semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)
  • Feature branches and release tags for version control.

  • Kitchen Systems & Accessories
  • Aluminium Profiles & Handles
  • Bed & Wardrobe Fittings and Accessories

🏭 Infrastructure

Brand Ambassador: Proudly represented by the cricketing icon Jasprit Bumrah, elevating Ebco’s brand presence.

  • Stunning landing page with responsive design.
  • Dynamic CMS handling using WordPress.
  • Comprehensive product listing and details pages.
  • Secure payment gateway integration with CCAvenue.
  • Custom Google Maps markers for Ebco’s distribution and discovery centers.

projects.name: MailBee
projects.details:
MailBee - Boost Your Email Productivity

MailBee is a custom Gmail plugin and website designed to supercharge your email workflow. Users can download the plugin from the Chrome Web Store and install it to track emails sent (via pixel tracking), automate follow-ups, and set reminders. This powerful tool integrates seamlessly with Gmail, offering a robust Google Sheets plugin for managing campaigns and enhancing communication.

Developed as a plugin, website, and dashboard, MailBee empowers users with efficient, personalized email management.

🚀 Powerful Features

  • 📊 Email Tracking – Real-time engagement insights, showing exactly when emails are opened to optimize outreach strategies.
  • ⏰ Email Reminders – Automatic prompts to follow up with clients, colleagues, or prospects, ensuring timely communication.
  • 🔄 Auto Follow-ups – Automated follow-up emails based on conditions (e.g., opened or replied), maximizing response rates effortlessly.
  • 📧 Smart Send – Import data from Google Sheets to send personalized mass emails to hundreds or thousands of recipients.

🌐 Components

  • Plugin – Built with Vanilla JavaScript and service workers, implementing all MailBee features (tracking, reminders, follow-ups, smart send).
  • Website – A responsive hub for plugin downloads and information, built with Next.js.
  • Dashboard – Features RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) with:
    • Admin – User management and price plan management (CRUD operations).
    • Customer – Customize profile, manage notification settings, quota, and create templates for reminders and follow-ups.

🌟 Benefits

  • 🚀 Productivity – Automates email tasks, saving time and effort.
  • 📈 Engagement – Real-time tracking and follow-ups improve response rates.
  • 💡 Scalability – Smart Send supports bulk email campaigns with personalization.
  • 🔒 Security – RBAC ensures controlled access and data management.

projects.name: Unischool
projects.details:
Unischool - Compliance Center for Chartered Schools

Unischool is a compliance and educational tool designed to formalize and track the creation, review, and approval of student learning reports for chartered schools. This platform ensures a streamlined, auditable workflow, fostering collaboration among Staff, Students, and Administrators.

Developed with Next.js and enhanced with modern technologies, Unischool delivers a robust compliance solution.

📋 Technical Documentation

Version: 1.0 | Date: June 14, 2025

1. Introduction & System Overview

This document outlines the technical specification for the Unischool Compliance Center, a system focused on generating periodic learning reports with a multi-step approval process.

1.1. Purpose

The primary goal is to create a streamlined, auditable workflow for learning reports, including academic grades, attendance, and supporting evidence, reviewed and approved by all stakeholders.

1.2. Key User Roles
  • Staff (Primary Teacher/Supervisor) – Initiates, fills out, and signs learning reports, handling grading, comments, and evidence uploads.
  • Student – Reviews and approves or rejects the report before it advances.
  • Admin – Conducts the final review and approval, overseeing the entire process.
1.3. High-Level Workflow
  • Creation (Staff) – Selects a student and learning period, saving progress as DRAFT.
  • Submission (Staff) – Completes details (grades, evidence, attendance) and digitally signs, moving to PENDING_STUDENT_APPROVAL.
  • Student Review – Notified to review via a secure link, approving or rejecting the report.
  • Admin Review – Upon student approval, status changes to PENDING_ADMIN_APPROVAL, notifying the admin.
  • Final Approval (Admin) – Approves the report, setting status to APPROVED; rejections revert to prior states for correction.

🌟 Benefits

  • ✅ Auditability – Ensures a transparent, traceable report approval process.
  • ⏱️ Efficiency – Automates multi-step workflows, saving time for educators.
  • 📊 Insights – Dashboard analytics with ApexCharts enhance decision-making.
  • 🔐 Security – Role-based access ensures data integrity and compliance.
